title: Sample how to create a custom virtualizing panel and good article on how UI virtualization works in UWP
body: Developers need to have good and deep understanding of how UI virtualization works on UWP app

comments.body: Any update on this? I need more information to implement infinite scrolling without wasting resources.
Agreed. I also faced the issue that there is not enough information about how to implement custom virtualizing Panel that can be used within GridView.

I'm looking for example and good article about UWP ListView (GridView) UI virtualization and what's the best way to implement custom virtualized layout Panel. For example I'd like to have Panel that layouts GridView items in similar way as VariableSizedWrapGrid but I need the content of that to be virtualized so I can use it in GridView with large data set.
The provided sample is about data virtualisation not ui virtualisation and custom panel. Someone needs to read it more carefully. This should not be flagged as complete
